attributes.action: Suspend the Human Rights Act, until it is reviewed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Put the Human Rights act on hold until a full review has taken place to insure the decent law abiding citizen gains and criminals or suspected criminals can not profit or use the law to escape punishment

rejection.details: There This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=Human+rights+act
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
